name: ${State.DoT.Physical}
note:
<Help Description>
${State.DoT.Physical.Desc}
</Help Description>
<Category: DoT>
<Negative State>
<JS HP Slip Damage>
 let atkmult = 0.4;
 let lukmult = 1;
 let defmult = 0.5;
 let element = 1; 
 let dotmult = 1; 
 
 let offense = ((user.atk * atkmult) + (user.mat * atkmult) + (user.luk * lukmult)) * dotmult;
 let defence = ((target.def * atkmult * defmult) + (target.mdf * atkmult * defmult) + (target.luk * lukmult * defmult)) * dotmult;
 damage = Math.max(0, (offense - defence) * target.elementRate(element) * target.elementRate(11)); 
</JS HP Slip Damage>
<JS Slip Refresh>

name: ${State.Mesmerized}
note:
<Help Description>
${State.Mesmerized.Desc}
</Help Description>
<AGI Flat: +50.5>
<JS On Expire State>
 counter = $gameVariables.value(10) + 1;
 if (counter < 4)
 target.addState(4 + Math.randomInt(10));
 else
 target.addState(37 + Math.randomInt(7));
 $gameVariables.setValue(10, counter);
</JS On Expire State>
